overview: Sally, Diana and Alice have supernatural powers. On the one hand very helpful, for example, to turn unbending people into rabbits, but on the other hand it is also a curse, because the sexual escapades are punished mercilessly by their lord and master. A power struggle breaks out among the sisters, because everyone wants to get to know Merlin, the hottest guy in the universe, more intimately.
title: Bezaubernde Hexen
